Articles.Content:
Bought this game a long time ago, six months plus. Only recently found out there's a forum attached too! XD

I guess I'm not really one for long-winded boring intros, but I got into the game due to my overarcing interest in astronomy and astrophysics; while KSP isn't a full-out space sim, it's also surprisingly fun. Current projects include a long-term mod-based station around Jool and a distant station project just outside the orbit of Eeloo. I'll probably post pictures of them at some point in the future.
Nice post and welcome to the forums! And indeed post some pictures!
Welcome to the forums! I guess it must be a pleasant discovery with all the challenges and discussions. It seems you'll beat me to Jool. I look forward to your station pictures.
